snippet: JK Youn’s “Ode to My Father” has an obsessive hero seeking relatives lost in the Korean War.
abstract: Jeannette Catsoulis reviews film Ode to My Father, directed by JK Youn.
lead_paragraph: JK Youn’s “Ode to My Father” has an obsessive hero seeking relatives lost in the Korean War.

headline.print_headline: Searching for Family Along a River of Tears
headline.seo: JK Youn’s ‘Ode to My Father’ Features a Korean Odyssey
headline.main: Searching for Family Along a River of Tears
